content: I'm writing a profile that uses an extension -- however, I want to constrain the valueCodeableConcept of that extension to a value set (but without changing the extension definition). So, from my profile structure definition, do I have to use invariants on my extension path to do it? Or do I "unroll" the extension in my differential to get to the element that has the valueCodeableConcept in it?
Ha. This essentially ends with the same answer as Mark and I's other question. Good to see some consistency. Thanks!
@Lloyd McKenzie Can you explain unroll - what does that mean?
It means drilling down into the content of the Extension data type as part of your differential (which will result in a corresponding drill-down in your snapshot)
